info.description:
Implementing atan as a 9 coefficient Chebyshev approximation, and using that to define acos and asin. The results are more accurate than the built in functions.

Horizontal scale [0,π/2], vertical scale ±1e-6, ie. 1/100th the scale of previous shader.
info.name: Inverse Trig Accuracy II
